oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 7% Saline IV, A New Approach to an Old Problem
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hines, J. A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hyper saline
fluid concentrates
fluid therapy
sterile water
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In our practice we became interested in the use of Hyper saline after seeing some research on its use in calves and horses that was done at Ohio State University. For years we had been using commercial fluid concentrates and diluting them for our fluid therapy. At best this procedure left much to be desired. Transporting large volumes of sterile water, calculating correct dilution, time required to administer fluids and cost to the client limited its use.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1991; 142
